# Cosine

> Raised cosine distribution.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var cosine = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dists/cosine' );
```

#### cosine

Raised cosine distribution.

```javascript
var dist = cosine;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
